snippet.title: Farewell - Nexuiz Frag Movie (Part 1)
snippet.description:
After 7 months in development, along with over 500 hours of work and more than a terabyte of videos and demos, I am pleased to announced that Farewell is complete!

Resolution: 1280x720
Encoding: AVI encapsulation, H264 video encoding, PCM audio.

Music:
Right Here, Right Now by Fatboy Slim
Born Too Slow by The Crystal Method
Get up on it Like This by The Chemical Brothers
Manu Dibango's African Battle, Remix done by Professor Kliq
The Distance by Cake

Font: Concielian by Dan Zadorozny
http://www.iconian.com/c.html

Thank you to everyone who sent me demos! I apologize if I did not add your demo in it, as there were many demos to go through. I might have plans for a future frag movie given the success on this one.

Once again, thank you for your patience!

-PCLizard

--FAIR USE--
Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use.
